name: TerribleLinguist
0:
”Alexa, ask terrible linguist to misspell "cat".”
”Alexa, ask terrible linguist for bad advice.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: terrible linguist
des: In the age of spell-check, auto-correct, and AI-powered virtual assistants it's hard to be wrong. The Terrible Linguist will have you quickly and easily misspelling words like it's 1982 all over again.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
